ygData.subject: Re: HG Investigation - Case File Addendum
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t you mean Warrior, monk, rogue?  Those are the only 3 melee only classes ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) To: eqbards@onelist.com Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Don't you mean Warrior, monk, rogue? Those are the only 3 melee only classes
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Sent: Saturday, February 12, 2000 10:30 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] HG Investigation - Case File Addendum


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

Ratboy, good to hear from you. but the question was: can a "melee class"
stand up to an HG and win? i.e. warrior, paladin, ranger, monk.

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Mulder, Scully
>
> Went into field. walked up to lvl 50 wizard, [Name removed for
> confidentiality] and paid her 25pp to kill a HG for me. Took
> 3 spell casts,
> HG never got into melee range.
>
> Krychek
